mapper.select: SELECT TO_CHAR(A.LASTUPDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS LASTUPDATE ,A.MFC_CD ,B.MFC_NM ,A.RRU_TYPE ,A.CQI_00 ,A.CQI_01 ,A.CQI_02 ,A.CQI_03 ,A.CQI_04 ,A.CQI_05 ,A.CQI_06 ,A.CQI_07 ,A.CQI_08 ,A.CQI_09 ,A.CQI_10 ,A.CQI_11 ,A.CQI_12 ,A.CQI_13 ,A.CQI_14 ,A.CQI_15 FROM LTE_CONST_CQI_THRP A, MFC_INFO B WHERE A.MFC_CD = B.MFC_CD(+) ORDER BY A.MFC_CD, A.RRU_TYPE
SELECT A.RSRP , A.THRP FROM LTE_CONST_UPLINK_RSRP A ORDER BY A.RSRP DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO LTE_CONST_UPLINK_RSRP (RSRP, THRP, LASTUPDATE) VALUES(#{RSRP}, #{THRP}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT A.CONST_TYPE , A.CONST_VAL , A.RAMARK , TO_CHAR(A.LASTUPDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS LASTUPDATE FROM LTE_CONST_TABLE A ORDER BY DECODE(A.CONST_TYPE,'IN_BUILD',1,'USER_INB',2,'USER_OUT',3,'ADJ_CELL',4)

SELECT A.CONST_TYPE , A.CONST_VAL , A.RAMARK , TO_CHAR(A.LASTUPDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS LASTUPDATE FROM LTE_CONST_UPLINK A ORDER BY DECODE(A.CONST_TYPE,'USER_INB',1,'USER_OUT',2,'FREQ_USE',3,'SECTORIZE',4)

SELECT USER_ID, USE_TYPE, DL_RRU_VAL1, DL_RRU_VAL2, DL_RRU_UNIT, DL_REPEATER_VAL1, DL_REPEATER_VAL2, DL_REPEATER_UNIT, PRB_USG_VAL1, PRB_USG_VAL2, PRB_USG_UNIT, UL_POWER_VAL1, UL_POWER_VAL2, UL_POWER_UNIT, REMARK, LASTUPDATE FROM LTE_CRITICAL_VALUE WHERE USE_TYPE = #{USE_TYPE}
AND USER_ID = #{USER_ID}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO LTE_CRITICAL_VALUE (USER_ID, USE_TYPE , DL_RRU_VAL1, DL_RRU_VAL2, DL_RRU_UNIT , DL_REPEATER_VAL1, DL_REPEATER_VAL2, DL_REPEATER_UNIT , PRB_USG_VAL1, PRB_USG_VAL2, PRB_USG_UNIT , UL_POWER_VAL1, UL_POWER_VAL2, UL_POWER_UNIT , LASTUPDATE) SELECT #{USER_ID}, 'USER' , DL_RRU_VAL1, DL_RRU_VAL2, DL_RRU_UNIT , DL_REPEATER_VAL1, DL_REPEATER_VAL2, DL_REPEATER_UNIT , PRB_USG_VAL1, PRB_USG_VAL2, PRB_USG_UNIT , UL_POWER_VAL1, UL_POWER_VAL2, UL_POWER_UNIT , SYSDATE FROM LTE_CRITICAL_VALUE WHERE USE_TYPE = 'ADMIN'
mapper.select: SELECT TO_CHAR(A.LASTUPDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS LASTUPDATE ,A.MFC_CD ,B.MFC_NM ,A.RSSI_01 ,A.RSSI_02 ,A.RSSI_03 ,A.RSSI_04 ,A.RSSI_05 ,A.RSSI_06 ,A.RSSI_07 ,A.RSSI_08 ,A.RSSI_09 ,A.RSSI_10 ,A.RSSI_11 ,A.RSSI_12 ,A.RSSI_13 ,A.RSSI_14 ,A.RSSI_15 ,A.RSSI_16 FROM LTE_CONST_RSSI A, MFC_INFO B WHERE A.MFC_CD = B.MFC_CD(+) ORDER BY A.MFC_CD
